## üìù Notes for Contributors

This wiki contains extended documentation that supplements the main README. For WordPress.org submission requirements, only the following files are maintained in the repository root:
- README.md (GitHub)
- readme.txt (WordPress.org format)
- LICENSE

All other documentation has been moved to this wiki for better organization.
